publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-338 Mr Mike Rumbles: Regulation of Cross Party Groups—That the Parliament agrees the arrangements for the regulation of Cross-Party Groups in the Scottish Parliament set out in the annex to the Second Report of the Standards Committee and that these should apply with immediate effect.

S1M-338 Mr Mike Rumbles: Regulation of Cross Party Groups—That the Parliament agrees the arrangements for the regulation of Cross-Party Groups in the Scottish Parliament set out in the annex to the Second Report of the Standards Committee and that these should apply with immediate effect.
